summary: Implements a mock response handler for the Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose service, translating incoming API calls into operations on an in‑memory backend and returning the appropriate JSON payloads.
business_intent: Enables developers and automated tests to simulate Firehose functionality—such as creating, describing, updating, and deleting delivery streams, ingesting records, configuring encryption, managing tags, and updating destinations—without invoking the real AWS service.
